name: part_013
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Yukihana Lamy finish their performance of "Kousui".
Instrumental transition between songs. Marine and Lamy leave the stage while Houshou Marine and Shiranui Flare prepare for the next performance.
Houshou Marine and Shiranui Flare perform "Hyadain no Joujou Yuujou".
Instrumental outro and transition to the next segment.
Marine and Minato Aqua appear on stage for a new segment.

subtitles.original: …君のドルチェ＆ガッバーナの
subtitles.english: ...it's because of your Dolce & Gabbana

subtitles.original: その香水のせいだよ
subtitles.english: perfume.

subtitles.original: 別に君を求めてないけど
subtitles.english: I'm not looking for you or anything,

subtitles.original: 横にいられると思い出す
subtitles.english: but when you're by my side, I remember.

subtitles.original: 君のドルチェ＆ガッバーナのその香水のせいだよ
subtitles.english: It's because of your Dolce & Gabbana perfume.

subtitles.original: じょーじょーゆーじょー
subtitles.english: Amazing friendship!

subtitles.original: ばじまじかいちょー
subtitles.english: Totally in high spirits!

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na na na na

subtitles.original: ヒャダインのじょーじょーゆーじょー
subtitles.english: Hyadain's Amazing Friendship

subtitles.original: はい！いっちゃいましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 君はベストフレンド！
subtitles.english: You're my best friend!

subtitles.original: ちょっとふざけてみたら
subtitles.english: When I mess around a little,

subtitles.original: もっとふざけ返してくる
subtitles.english: you mess around even more back at me.

subtitles.original: ランララ　居心地いいったらない
subtitles.english: Lan lala, it couldn't be more comfortable.

subtitles.original: 嫌なことあったって
subtitles.english: Even when something bad happens,

subtitles.original: そこは忘れちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: I end up forgetting about it there.

subtitles.original: ランララ　いっせーのーでジャンジャンやりましょう
subtitles.english: Lan lala, one, two, let's keep it going!

subtitles.original: 24時間一緒でも問題ない
subtitles.english: It's no problem even if we're together for 24 hours.

subtitles.original: まるで双子か親子かクローン細胞
subtitles.english: Just like twins, parent and child, or cloned cells.

subtitles.original: これじゃあ熱中する必要とかなくなくない？
subtitles.english: Doesn't this mean there's no need to be so obsessed?

subtitles.original: それとこれとは全く全く別問題！
subtitles.english: That and this are completely, completely different issues!

subtitles.original: 喧嘩しちゃった時も
subtitles.english: Even when we've had a fight,

subtitles.original: かなり凹んだ時も
subtitles.english: or when I'm feeling really down,

subtitles.original: 一人でいたいような時も
subtitles.english: or even when I feel like being alone,

subtitles.original: ふと気づけば近くにいるしなまもろとも
subtitles.english: before I know it, you're near, and we're in this together.

subtitles.original: なんでだろ　側にいたいんだ
subtitles.english: I wonder why I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: 君と一緒なら
subtitles.english: If I'm with you,

subtitles.original: 時給100倍さ
subtitles.english: the value of my time increases a hundredfold!

subtitles.original: 楽しいな　楽しすぎるんだ
subtitles.english: It's fun, it's just too much fun.

subtitles.original: さすが最強フレンド　Hey!
subtitles.english: As expected of the strongest friend! Hey!

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ　ヤバいシンクロ率
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na, crazy synchronization rate!

subtitles.original: いつも大騒ぎ　かなりご近所迷惑
subtitles.english: Always making a fuss, quite a nuisance to the neighbors.

subtitles.original: 今何時？　一に二に三！
subtitles.english: What time is it? One, two, three!

subtitles.original: わけわかんないない　ソレドシラソ
subtitles.english: I don't understand it at all! So-Re-Do-Si-La-So!

subtitles.original: 想像以上なんて愉快最高
subtitles.english: More than I imagined, it's the best fun ever!

subtitles.original: あだこだ言ってても友達　ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Even if we bicker about this and that, we're friends! Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: じょーじょーゆーじょー　ばじまじかいちょー
subtitles.english: Amazing friendship! Totally in high spirits!

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na na na na

subtitles.original: マリフレのじょーじょーゆーじょー、2番もお聞きください！
subtitles.english: Please listen to the second verse of Mari-Flare's "Joujou Yuujou"!

subtitles.original: 同じテレビ見てて　メールで実況中継
subtitles.english: Watching the same TV show, doing a live commentary via text.

subtitles.original: ランララ　CM入れば電話タイム
subtitles.english: Lan lala, once the commercials start, it's phone time.

subtitles.original: 遠くにいる時でも　近くに感じてるんだ
subtitles.english: Even when we're far apart, I feel you close by.

subtitles.original: ランララ　ヨロシクガンガン行きましょう
subtitles.english: Lan lala, let's keep going strong!

subtitles.original: ヤバい弁当忘れたカンパして
subtitles.english: Oh no, I forgot my lunch! Give me some money.

subtitles.original: やだよ命の源焼きそばパン
subtitles.english: No way! This yakisoba bread is my life force.

subtitles.original: ちょいと友達なんでしょごもっともな
subtitles.english: Hey, aren't we friends? You're quite right.

subtitles.original: それとこれとは全く全く別問題！
subtitles.english: That and this are completely, completely different issues!

subtitles.original: 変な気は使わない　好色なんか知らない
subtitles.english: We don't worry about being weird, and we don't care about looks.

subtitles.original: でも傷つけたりはしない
subtitles.english: But we would never hurt each other.

subtitles.original: 神様マジありがとうゲットできたマブダチ
subtitles.english: God, thank you so much! I've found a true friend.

subtitles.original: やったあ　おっしゃー　マイフレンド
subtitles.english: Yay! Alright! My friend!

subtitles.original: 最高潮！　不謹慎崩壊
subtitles.english: At our peak! Breaking the rules!

subtitles.original: 涙が出るくらい　笑い疲れちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: I'm getting tired from laughing so much I'm in tears.

subtitles.original: 何しよう？　何をしましょうか？
subtitles.english: What should we do? What shall we do?

subtitles.original: しりとりレッツゴー！　わー！
subtitles.english: Shiritori, let's go! Whoo!

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ　南海ライナー
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na, Nankai Liner!

subtitles.original: ラブラブゴリラ
subtitles.english: Lovey-dovey Gorilla!

subtitles.original: なんだその生き物
subtitles.english: What kind of creature is that?

subtitles.original: もう飽きた　マジかよヨロレヒ
subtitles.english: I'm bored already. Seriously? Yodel-ay-hee!

subtitles.original: 意味もないない　ソレドシラソ
subtitles.english: It makes no sense at all! So-Re-Do-Si-La-So!

subtitles.original: 友達数と暑苦しく思ってた
subtitles.english: I used to think having friends was just annoying...

subtitles.original: でもでも　やっぱ言えないや　Because
subtitles.english: But, but... I still can't say it, because...

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na na na na

subtitles.original: はい！いっちゃいましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 君はベストフレンド！
subtitles.english: You're my best friend!

subtitles.original: なんでだろ　側にいたいんだ
subtitles.english: I wonder why I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: 君と一緒なら
subtitles.english: If I'm with you,

subtitles.original: 時給100倍さ
subtitles.english: the value of my time increases a hundredfold!

subtitles.original: 楽しいな　楽しすぎるんだ
subtitles.english: It's fun, it's just too much fun.

subtitles.original: さすが最強フレンド　Hey!
subtitles.english: As expected of the strongest friend! Hey!

subtitles.original: ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ・ナ　ヤバいシンクロ率
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na, crazy synchronization rate!

subtitles.original: いつも大騒ぎ　かなりご近所迷惑
subtitles.english: Always making a fuss, quite a nuisance to the neighbors.

subtitles.original: 今何時？　一に二に三！
subtitles.english: What time is it? One, two, three!

subtitles.original: わけわかんないない　ソレドシラソ
subtitles.english: I don't understand it at all! So-Re-Do-Si-La-So!

subtitles.original: 想像以上なんて愉快最高
subtitles.english: More than I imagined, it's the best fun ever!

subtitles.original: あだこだ言ってても友達　ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Even if we bicker about this and that, we're friends! Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: じょーじょーゆーじょー　ばじまじかいちょー
subtitles.english: Amazing friendship! Totally in high spirits!

subtitles.original: ジャジャジャジャジャン！
subtitles.english: Ja ja ja ja jan!
